DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine provide genomic information veteran help lose weight compare usual care .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrigenomics : Personalizing Weight Loss Obese Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: About 35 % veteran obese . The MOVE ! program nation-wide 8-week program group class nationally help obese veteran lose weight . While program successful veteran , 75 % veteran unable lose ≥5 % weight 24 week MOVE ! New method need help obese veteran seek weight loss . Using personalized genomic information dictate specific diet , information exercise eating behavior , may one mean help promote weight loss . Just single nucleotide change polymorphism ( SNP ) gene increase person 's risk obesity , change lipid profile response consumption different macronutrients fat carbohydrate . Over 54 genetic locus associate obesity phenotypes clinical study report association SNPs and/or functional alteration gene expression ( epigenetics ) ability lose weight . We implement randomized clinical trial test set genomic data call FIT™ test ( Pathway Genomics™ ) contain information SNPs affect obesity risk , confer specific diet recommendation , outline eat behavior suggest response various exercise regimen . The overall goal project evaluate supplemental genetic information genomically-derived diet build around package meal improve adherence , parallel MOVE ! program VA San Diego , promote weight loss obese veteran receive usual care eat diet base around package meal . Our primary hypothesis obese veteran MOVE ! program lose 5 % weight receive personalize genomic information genomically-derived diet build around package meal compare veteran program receive usual care MOVE ! package meal 8 24 week . We also hypothesize veteran genomic group lose 5 % weight loss 8 week maintain weight loss 24 week compare veteran usual care group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Veterans able receive care VASDHS plan start MOVE ! program . 2 . Veterans able understand consent study . 3 . BMI equal great 30 kg/m2 . 1 . Veterans unable receive care VASDHS . 2 . Veterans unable understand consent process discretion PI . 3 . Active substance abuse substance dependence disorder 4 . Cognitive disorder , psychiatric hospitalization past 6months , presence suicidal ideation identify selfreport instrument 5 . Bradycardia , rapid heart rate arrhythmia active ischemia EKG . 6 . Uncontrolled thyroid disease measure TSH normal range . 7 . Body mass index < 30 kg/m2 . 8 . Chronic kidney disease stage III high National Kidney Foundation criterion ( GFR = 3059 ml/min ) . 9 . New York Heart Association 's functional classification congestive heart failure Class I ( limited normal physical activity symptom ; Class II occur ordinary physical activity result fatigue , dyspnea , symptom ) . 10 . Sodium potassium outside normal range . 11 . Edema require use daily diuresis furosemide , bumex diuretic ( include hydrochlorthiazide ) . 12 . The use high dose oral corticosteroid ( replacement dos ) . 13 . Veterans deficient 25OH vitamin D ( < 20 units/dl ) . 14 . Veterans fast LDL > 190 mg/dl . 15 . Veterans fast triglyceride level > 1000 mg/dl . 16 . Excessive caffeine use ( > 6 caffeinated beverages/days ) . 17 . Prior gastrointestinal surgery exception distal appendectomy . 18 . Acute infection current use antibiotic therapy .
